TextView.android:text:
Mid rider is an amazing game to improve your musical culture! 
 
 You can play in two differents modes: Blind Test and Fun. 
 
 In each mode you can earn notes in order to access new levels, new characters and new backgrouds! But you do not earn the same quantity of notes. 
 In Blind test mode, if you find the good answer in the blind test, you will improve your quantity of notes, but if you do not, it will be bad. 
 In Fun mode, you earn notes each time you play but it is really less than in blind test mode. 
 
 In the main menu, you have access to the settings menu where you can calibrate the accelerometer. 
 
 If you click on play, you have access to a menu where you can choose the mode and if you are in Fun mode, you can choose the song you want to play. 
 During the mode, you have to collect the notes. Each time you take one note, a sound is played. If you collect plenty of notes without errors, you can hear the musical arrangement and you get combo. You have your score on the top-right and the combo mode on the bottom-right. 
 However, if you avoid all the notes you won't be able to find the song because you won't hear anything. 
 
 Let's play!!!
